original: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati, tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāvaṁ.
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni abhisambujjhati tattha ca sabbaññu tam pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāva

original: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati, na ca tattha sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti na ca balesu vasībhāvaṁ.
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni abhisambujjhati na ca tattha sabbaññu tam pāpuṇāti na ca balesu vasībhāva

original: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, diṭṭhe ceva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti sāvakapāramiñca pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni an abhisambujjhati diṭṭhe ca iva dhamme dukkha ssanta karaḥ hoti sāvaka pāramiñca pāpuṇāti

original: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, na ca sāvakapāramiṁ pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni an abhisambujjhati diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkha ssanta karaḥ hoti na ca sāvaka pāramim pāpuṇāti

original: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthattaṁ.
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni an abhisambujjhati na ca diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkha ssanta karaḥ hoti anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthatta

original: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, āgāmī hoti āgantā itthattaṁ.
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni an abhisambujjhati na ca diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkha ssanta karaḥ hoti āgāmī hoti āgantā itthatta
